osvSchema.details: Exposed IOCTL with insufficient access control issue exists in cg6kwin2k.sys prior to 2.1.7.0. By sending a specific IOCTL request, a user without the administrator privilege may perform I/O to arbitrary hardware port or physical address, resulting in erasing or altering the firmware.

description_data.value: Exposed IOCTL with insufficient access control issue exists in cg6kwin2k.sys prior to 2.1.7.0. By sending a specific IOCTL request, a user without the administrator privilege may perform I/O to arbitrary hardware port or physical address, resulting in erasing or altering the firmware.

description.value: Exposed IOCTL with Insufficient Access Control

descriptions.value: Exposed IOCTL with insufficient access control issue exists in cg6kwin2k.sys prior to 2.1.7.0. By sending a specific IOCTL request, a user without the administrator privilege may perform I/O to arbitrary hardware port or physical address, resulting in erasing or altering the firmware.

Existe un IOCTL expuesto con un problema de control de acceso insuficiente en cg6kwin2k.sys anterior a 2.1.7.0. Al enviar una solicitud IOCTL específica, un usuario sin privilegios de administrador puede realizar E/S en un puerto de hardware o dirección física arbitraria, lo que resulta en el borrado o alteración del firmware.
